name: Save new RocketReach completed lookups to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new lookup has been completed in RocketReach,  Make will automatically add data from that lookup to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UDdKsvKKLbp6bZ3sl2Y1LNRn2cXQZreb4ZdqTE9wrpY/edit?usp=sharing).
